divs: sighting detailsapprox 10.30pm walking to my van parked at rear of house ( no lighting) look across sky to see if cloudy or clear approx west coast see 3 red lights forming a triangle. as i looked closer and focused i noticed they were in fact each point of the triangle 3 smaller triangles of red light's. beliving that my eyes were still ajusting to the dark i watied and watched the bottom left hand triangle moved up and around to the top triangle and then moved to the bottom triangl. the top triangle then moved down and around both triangles and returned to the same postion.they then began to move at speed around each other for about 20 \ 30 seconds untill they settaled back into the same postion as i had first seen them. they red lighs then begane to pulsate and grow brighter and suddenly they disapered. i mention this to my son and his friend a week later but asked them not to tell any one. then last night i was walking back to my van again and noticed a line of 3 red lights from left to right but looking like they were one thing. i then noticed a small set of red lights with a green light moving around the red lights . the second set of lights with the green light i recognised as an aircraft but it appeared to be cicleing the other lights that did not appear to move. i called my son out telling him to tell me what he could see and he said he could see the 3 lights togethher as part of 1 thing but what was the plane doing there? the plane begane to move away and head back acroos to france as the plane took about 90 seconds to move to just above our postion the other lights disapered and reappeard in front of the plane and to the north travelling a distance of at least 10 miles in 1 second. stayed for about 10 to 15 seconds and dissapeard. i know this might sound stupid but the thing that me and my son found strange was the fact that our airport closes at 9.pm unless for a seriouse medical emergency and we know the area we notice the lights in was french airforce air space. the plane was also flying over channel island airspace, but directly over the island and about 5 to 10,000 ft this does not happen ....ever. i have decided to tell you this as my son has posted that we had seen something on facebook and one of his friends commented that people reported seeing strange lights in august in guernsey. some have reported chinnese lanterns but they were to far away and sorry but dont move at that speed.
